Name: Project Océara
About the game: Project Océara is a hardcore 2D platform game, the game is divided into several levels which are becoming harder. In each level you simply have to find and take the exit. You will have the possibility to move in space, use a fast movement or to fire projectiles. Warning: this game is hard
Meta Title: Project Océara: May 2020, Indépendant and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Project Océara? Check out the release date (May 2020), developer insights from Indépendant, and a complete game summary.
